meaningMnemonic: Having a foul <radical>mouth</radical> and <radical>horns</radical> will prevent you from getting into <radical>Heaven</radical> where you would <kanji>blossom</kanji> into an angel. If you have horns, you are not meant for Heaven and will not blossom there. To blossom in Heaven, you must not have horns or a foul mouth.
readingMnemonic: You don’t want to <kanji>blossom</kanji> into a demon so you <reading>saw</reading> (さ) off your horns with a saw. If you saw off your horns, maybe you can beg for forgiveness and have your foul mouth forgiven.
